CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 28, 1955, pg. 5, reads: "MARBLES CHAMPS - The city of Pittsburgh marble championship was won by Jerome Collins, 14, left, bottom, of 1907 Colwell Street, while Raymond Jones Jr., 12, of 1015 Franklin Street, was runner-up. Posing with the boys are William Dorsey, recreation director, Department of Parks and Recreation, left, and Stephen A. Bodnar, director. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of 1955 city of Pittsburgh marbles runner-up Raymond Jones Jr., and champion Jerome Collins squatting over marbles, with director of Parks and Recreation Stephan A. Bodnar and William Dorsey, posed behind them
